title: BATCH ENGINEERING - Hold CRS Engine Batch
time_sequence: CH - DATA VALIDATION IN TEST ENVIRONMENT

task_list.instruction_title:
Hold CRS Engine Batch: We do not want the CRS engine to run during the night from 23.05 to 24.05

Here are the jobs in scope:

 P-CLI-XXCUSTOMER et P-ENG-* sur le Control M server PRD-GVA-SEC-DC sur la ODATE 23.05.2025

+

P001-ENG-ENG-R000 + P001-ENG-ENG-R020 + P001-ENG-ENG-R030 sur CTRLM PRD-GVA-COM-DC sur la ODATE 23.05.2025 (ATTENTION: supprimer les CREATE_CONDITION automatique à 6h dans **Actions**)
